title: Huon's new harvest
brief_description: The construction of a wood pulping factory in southern Tasmania. How the great eucalypt forests are managed, huge logs converted to pulp pellets, and then these pellets are shipped to Sydney where strong packaging paper is manufactured for supply to fibreboard container manufacturers.
